title: Tears of a Cowgirl
description: Katherine is a small-town girl; her passion is raising horses. The day she met Chris, she fell in love; however, love can be deceiving. She spent several years with the man she thought she loved, then one day he changed. Now she and her son are on the run; their life's in danger, caught in a battle she never saw coming.Katherine gets trapped in the mountains with a handsome stranger, surviving an unforeseen snowstorm. It's an emotional story that will leave you breathless.
author: Jupiter Rose
